vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_wrmacror(unsigned short FlibHndl, short length, IODBMR *macror);

cmn.p: Writes the custom macro variable specified by "datano_s", "datano_e". The data must be stored in "IODBMR" with signed binary format.
The kind of custom macro variable is as follows. The local variable cannot be written.
cmn.ol: Common variable (#100,..,#999) See the description of cnc_rdmacroinfo function about the available range of common variables.
cmn.p: It is possible to exchange the type of macro variable by cnc_setmactype function.

tr.td:
value of variable(=M)
4-byte binary data with sign
(available range:999999999,..,-999999999)

number of places of decimals(=E)
2-byte binary data with sign
(available range:-128,..,127)

numerical part of variable(=M)
4-byte binary data with sign
(available range:No limitation)

exponent part of variable(=E)
2-byte binary data with sign
(available range:-128,..,127)

cmn.p: The value of an undefined variable is called "vacant", and it is expressed as follows both at decimal form floating-point type and at binary form floating-point type.
See "OPERATOR'S MANUAL" of CNC for details of the custom macro variable.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.
Specify the data block length (size of IODBMR structure).
N : Number of custom macro variable
Pointer to the IODBMR structure including the custom macro variable. The IODBMR structure is as follows.

dl.dd: Specify the start custom macro variable number.
Specify the end custom macro variable number.
Specify the value of variable/numerical part of variable.
Specify the number of places of decimals/exponent part of variable.

item.name: EW_DATA
item.content:

item.content:
No option

item.content:
protection error (30i/31i/32i, 0i-D/F, PMi-A only)
